news.content:
Your Weekly 3Node Update!


https://forum.threefold.io/t/november-29th-3node-team-update-north-america-shipping-admin-portal-technical-support-more/1533


Today, the first batch of Titans begins shipping to North America! ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡½ Weâ€™ve got some more updates inside. Take a look!


As always, you can find farming-related conversations in the farming chat.
news.excerpt: Today, the first batch of Titans begins shipping to North America!

previous.title: Your November 22 Titan Update
previous.excerpt: This week, weâ€™re covering shipping, compensation for the unexpected 3Node configuration issue, upgrades to our process, expanding support, & more.
